trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms inclui suporte interno de acessibilidade que permite que seu aplicativo trabalhar com aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade incluem utilitários ampliador e Revisor de tela, utilitários de entrada de voz, teclados na tela, dispositivos de entrada alternativos e os utilitários de aprimoramento de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe para fornecer informações sobre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Cada classe que representa uma parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>— como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>— também contém uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> para fornecer informações sobre a classe continente e executar ações em nome dos aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Há ocasiões em que você deve fornecer informações adicionais, como o nome ou descrição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de fornecer essas informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer informações de acessibilidade limitada para controles existentes, defina o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> valores de propriedade, que serão relatados para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> valores de propriedade somente em situações raras, como se você tornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a aparência de uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, você pode exigir mais informações sobre acessibilidade ou ações diferentes de acessibilidade para ser incluído no personalizados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a acessibilidade, você pode escrever sua própria classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver escrevendo uma célula de cabeçalho de linha personalizado que implementa exclusivas ações personalizadas, como o teste de clique especiais dentro de sua célula, você deve criar uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> expõe sua estrutura de dados usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> valores para definir os dados de tabela hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a exposição de tabelas de dados para acessibilidade ativa da Microsoft, consulte "Expor dados de tabelas por meio de Microsoft Active Accessibility" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local e o tamanho do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a ação padrão do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a ação padrão das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> belongs to a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, this property returns the string "Press to sort column".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> pertence a uma coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, essa propriedade retorna a cadeia de caracteres "Pressionar para classificar a coluna".

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, this property returns the string "Press to select column".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, essa propriedade retorna a cadeia de caracteres "Pressionar para selecionar a coluna".

trans-unit.source: If neither of these conditions is present or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> does not currently belong to a column, this property returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma dessas condições estiver presente ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> não pertencer a uma coluna, essa propriedade retornará <xref:System.String.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: Performs the default action associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa a ação padrão associada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The default action is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.DefaultAction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ação padrão é indicada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.DefaultAction%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> property of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> propriedade da célula de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Navega para outro objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa um objeto na direção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> owns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve quais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> possui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> que é retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valor do parâmetro

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to the right of the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> à direita da célula de cabeçalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to the left of the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> à esquerda da célula de cabeçalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> after the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> após a célula de cabeçalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> before the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> antes da célula de cabeçalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> Retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> é de propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The last <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: A última <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.

trans-unit.source: The direction that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method moves when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous> depends on whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has right-to-left support enabled.
trans-unit.target: A direção que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> método move quando você especificar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous> depende se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> tiver habilitado o suporte da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: For example, if right-to-left support is enabled, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> will return the same accessible object when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o suporte da direita para a esquerda estiver habilitado, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> retornará o mesmo objeto acessível quando você especificar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left>.

trans-unit.source: If right-to-left support is not enabled, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> will return the same object when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right>.
trans-unit.target: Se não estiver habilitado o suporte da direita para esquerda, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> retornará o mesmo objeto quando você especificar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right>.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O pai do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.RowHeader" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.RowHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the column selection depending on the selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Modifica a seleção de coluna dependendo do modo de seleção.

trans-unit.source: If the owning cell does not belong to a column, no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula proprietária não pertencer a uma coluna, nenhuma ação é executada.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the following table describes the action performed for each `flags` value.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a tabela a seguir descreve a ação executada para cada `flags` valor.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valor do parâmetro

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Ação

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control that contains the owning cell has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, the column containing the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle que contém a propriedade de célula possui uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, a coluna que contém a célula é selecionada.

trans-unit.source: If the column containing the cell is selected, the selection is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Se a coluna que contém a célula é selecionada, a seleção será cancelada.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> values
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> valores

trans-unit.source: No action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma ação será tomada.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> property value always includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> sempre inclui o valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable> valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that contains the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> valor se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> que contém a célula estiver selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen> value if the owning cell is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen> valor se a célula proprietária não for exibida no momento.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
